title: Looking at animals: pigs and hippos
creator_credit: Peter Boulton, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Boulton-Hawker Films
brief_description: Illustrates the main characteristics of the related group of animals which includes pigs, peccaries and hippopotami. Draws attention to the feet and snout of pigs, and the adaptation of the hippopotamus to an amphibious life.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Boulton, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Boulton-Hawker Films
